annotations.annotation: Section 1401 of D.C. Law 13-38 provided: “This title may be cited as the ‘Productivity Bank Fund Establishment Act of 1999’.”
For temporary (90-day) addition of section, see § 1402 of the Service Improvement and Fiscal Year 2000 Budget Support Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-110, July 28, 1999, 46 DCR 6320).
For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7102 of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-91, July 22, 2019, 66 DCR 8497).
For temporary (90 days) repeal of this section, see § 7102 of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-112, Sept. 4, 2019, 66 DCR 11964).
